metadata.title: CVE-2023-29545 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Similar to CVE-2023-28163, this time when choosing 'Save Link As',suggested filenames containing environment variable names would haveresolved those in the context of the current user. *This bug only affectsFirefox and Thunderbird on Windows. Other versions of Firefox andThunderbird are unaffected.* This vulnerability affects Firefox < 112,Firefox ESR < 102.10, and Thunderbird < 102.10.

criterions.comment: mozjs78: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
mozjs91: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
